primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the laptop on the cabinet
Turn on the lamp

annotation: Examine the laptop by the light

primitive_skills.annotations: take the pencil from the desk
Put the pencil on the desk

annotation: Take the pencil from the desk, put it on the other side of the desk

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the lettuce on the counter.
Chill the lettuce in the fridge.
Put the chilled lettuce on the counter, in front of the bread.

annotation: Put chilled lettuce on the counter.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up an egg from off of the kitchen counter
Open the fridge, put the egg in to chill for a few seconds and then take it back out
Place the cold egg in the sink

annotation: Chill an egg and put it in the sink

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the butter knife off of the right side of the kitchen island.
Put the knife handle down in the frying pan that is on the front left burner of the stove.
Pick up the frying pan with the knife in it off of the stove.
Put the frying pan with the knife in it into the sink basin to the right of the potato.

annotation: Put a frying pan with a knife in it into the sink.

primitive_skills.annotations: pick up the left pillow on the chair
put the pillow on the sofa right of the newspaper
pick up the pillow on the chair
put the pillow on the sofa left of the newspaper

annotation: Place two pillows on a sofa

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up a knife from the counter
Cut the apple in the sink
Put the knife down in the sink
Pick up an apple slice
Heat the apple slice
Put the apple slice down

annotation: Put a heated apple slice on the kitchen island

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the knife on the counter
Slice the tomato on the counter
Put the knife in the fridge
Pick up a tomato slice from the counter
Put the tomato slice in the fridge, wait, pick up the tomato slice from the fridge
Put the tomato slice on the counter

annotation: Slice a tomato and cool a slice of it

primitive_skills.annotations: Take the apple on the right from the sink.

annotation: Take the knife from the counter.

primitive_skills.annotations: Bend down and get the fruit out of the trash

annotation: Bend down and get the fruit out of the trash
